uffr inner join u_fb_form_response_audit uffra ON uffra.u_fb_form_response_id = uffr.id AND uffra.user_id IS NOT NULL WHERE UFFR.U_FB_FORM_ID = ~[gpv:formid;0] ~[if#ro.~[x:userid]#] AND UFFRA.USER_ID = ~[x:userid][/if#ro][/if#studentid] ~[if#studentid.~[gpv:formtype]=P] AND UFFR.STUDENT_ID = ~(curstudid)[/if#studentid] ~[if#ti.~[gpv:formtype]=TI] AND ON UFFR.uffr_ID = UFFRE.U_FB_FORM_RESPONSE_ID AND UFFRD.U_FB_FORM_RESPONSE_ELEMENT_ID = UFFRE.ID WHERE UFFR.RN = ~[if#res.~[gpv:responseid]=](select CASE count(*) WHEN 0 THEN 1 ELSE 999999999 END from u_fb_form where id = ~[gpv:formid;0] AND upper(archive_by) LIKE '%REFRESH%')[else#res]1[/if#res] ORDER BY NVL(UFFR.WHENMODIFIED,UFFR.WHENCREATED) desc ) UFFR ON uffe.id = UFFR.U_FB_FORM_ELEMENT_ID WHERE UFFE.U_FB_FORM_ID = ~[gpv:formid;0]) ||chr(93)||'}' as content from u_fb_form uff where uff.id = ~[gpv:formid;0]]~(content)[/tlist_sql] }
